original: @472b rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: rgya gar skad du

original: a'arya pra dzny'am pa ra mi t'a n'a ka a'ashta sha ta ka na /
analyzed: aarya pra dzny ba ra mi ta na ka aashta sha ta ka na

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa /
analyzed: phag ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad ba

original: bcom ldan 'das @473a *//
analyzed: joms ldan da

original: ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag tshal lo

original: 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi //
analyzed: da dang ma byon da ltar gyi

original: rgyal ba gang lags de kun gyi //
analyzed: rgyal ba gang lags de kun gyi

original: yum ni dge ma khyod lags te //
analyzed: yum ni dge ma khyod lags te

original: khyod ni lha mo rgyal ba'i sras //
analyzed: khyod ni lha mo rgyal ba sras

original: rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin can //
analyzed: rang bzhin med ba rang bzhin can

original: sangs rgyas yum gyur de yi mtshan //
analyzed: sangs rgya yum gyur de yi mtshan

original: dge ma bdag gis brjod par bya; ;'byor par 'dod pas mnyan par bgyis //
analyzed: dge ma bdag gis rjod ba bya; ;byor ba dod ba nyan ba bgyid

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba dang thams cad mkhyen ba nyid dang lam gyi rnam ba thams cad mkhyen ba nyid dang rnam ba thams cad mkhyen ba nyid dang yang dag ba mtha dang de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang

original: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / bden pa dang / de kho na dang / yang dag pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa nyid dang / smon pa med pa nyid dang /
analyzed: gzhan ma yin ba de bzhin nyid dang bden ba dang de kho na dang yang dag ba dang phyin ci ma log ba nyid dang stong ba nyid dang mtshan ma med ba nyid dang smon ba med ba nyid dang

original: dngos po med pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang /
analyzed: dngos po med ba nyid dang ngo bo nyid dang dngos po med ba ngo bo nyid dang chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang chos gnas ba nyid dang chos mi gyur ba nyid dang chos skyon med ba nyid dang

original: chos kyi mtshan nyid dang / chos bdag med pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang / @473b sems can med pa nyid dang / srog med pa nyid dang / gso ba med pa nyid dang / skyes bu med pa nyid dang /
analyzed: chos kyi mtshan nyid dang chos bdag med ba nyid dang ngo bo nyid med ba nyid dang sems can med ba nyid dang srog med ba nyid dang gso ba med ba nyid dang skye bu med ba nyid dang

original: gang zag med pa nyid dang / brjod du med pa nyid dang / brjod par bya ba ma yin pa dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang / bral ba dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang /
analyzed: gang zag med ba nyid dang rjod du med ba nyid dang rjod ba byed ba ma yin ba dang sems dang yid dang rnam ba shes ba dang bral ba dang mnyam ba med ba dang mi mnyam ba dang

original: mnyam pa dang / bdag gi ba med pa dang / rgyags pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / spros pa dang bral ba dang / spros pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum dang /
analyzed: mnyam ba dang bdag gi ba med ba dang rgyags ba med ba dang spros ba med ba dang spros ba dang bral ba dang spros ba thams cad las shin tu da ba dang sangs rgya thams cad kyi yum dang

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad skyed pa dang / nyan thos thams cad 'dzin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad skrun pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs zad mi shes pa bsags pa dang / ye shes 'bab pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa thams cad skyed ba dang nyan thos thams cad dzin ba dang rang sangs rgya thams cad skrun ba dang jig rten thams cad dzin ba dang bsod nams kyi tshogs zad mi shes ba bsags ba dang ye shes bab ba dang

original: rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa dang / lha'i mig rnam par sbyong bar mdzad pa dang / lha'i rna ba rab tu dang bar mdzad pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes par mdzad pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par mdzad pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang /
analyzed: rdzu phrul mdzad ba dang lha mig rnam ba sbyong ba mdzad ba dang lha rna ba rab tu dang ba mdzad ba dang pha rol gyi sems shes ba mdzad ba dang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran ba mdzad ba dang chi pho ba dang

original: skye ba shes par mdzad pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par mdzad pa dang / 'phags pa dang / gtsang ba dang / bsangs pa dang / dran pa nye bar @474a *//
analyzed: skye ba shes ba mdzad ba dang nyon mongs ba thams cad zad ba mdzad ba dang phag ba dang gtsang ba dang bsangs ba dang dran ba nye ba

original: gzhag pa la gnas pa dang / yang dag par spong pa'i shugs dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / bar mdzad pa dang / stobs mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: jog ba la gnas ba dang yang dag ba spong ba shugs dang ldan ba dang rdzu phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi zhabs nang stong ba nyid dang stong ba nyid stong ba nyid dang ba mdzad ba dang stobs mdzad ba dang

original: kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po ches mdzes par byas pa dang / nor bdun sbyin par mdzad pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ston par mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med ba dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po ches mdzes ba byed ba dang nor bdun sbyin ba mdzad ba dang phag ba lam yan lag brgyad ba ston ba dang mthar gyis gnas ba snyom ba jug ba dgu ston ba mdzad ba dang

original: dbang bcu sgrub pa dang / sa bcu la gnas par mdzad pa dang / stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / zad par gyi skye mched bcus mdzes par byas pa dang / shes pa bcu sgrub pa dang / bag la nyal bcu'i dgra 'jig par mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: dbang chu sgrub ba dang sa chu la gnas ba mdzad ba dang stobs chu yongs su rdzogs ba mdzad ba dang zad ba gyi skye mched chu mdzes ba byed ba dang shes ba chu sgrub ba dang bag la nyal chu dgra jig ba mdzad ba dang

original: bsam gtan rnams sgrub par mdzad pa dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar mdzad pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa dang / shes pa thams cad mdzad pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams sgrub ba mdzad ba dang gzugs med ba khams las yang dag ba da ba mdzad ba dang yang dag ba rdzogs ba sangs rgya thams cad kyis bstod ba dang shes ba thams cad mdzad ba dang nang stong ba nyid dang

original: phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: phyi stong ba nyid dang phyi nang stong ba nyid dang stong ba nyid stong ba nyid dang chen po stong ba nyid dang don dam ba stong ba nyid dang du byed stong ba nyid dang du ma byed stong ba nyid dang

original: mtha' @474b las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang / tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: mtha las da ba stong ba nyid dang thogs ma dang tha ma med ba stong ba nyid dang dor ba med ba stong ba nyid dang rang bzhin stong ba nyid dang chos thams cad stong ba nyid dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid dang

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / ma byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang /
analyzed: mi dmigs ba stong ba nyid dang dngos po med ba stong ba nyid dang ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid dang dngos po med ba ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid dang ma byung ba dang ma skye ba dang ma gag ba dang

original: chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / don gcig pa ma yin pa dang / tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa dang /
analyzed: chad ba med ba dang rtag ba med ba dang don gcig ba ma yin ba dang tha dad ba ma yin ba dang ng ba med ba dang gro ba med ba dang rten cing brel ba byung ba rnam ba bsgom ba dang

original: rab tu brtag par bya ba ma yin pa dang / rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa dang / gzhi med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / brtag par bya ba ma yin pa dang / rig par bya ba ma yin pa dang /
analyzed: rab tu rtog ba byed ba ma yin ba dang rnam ba shes ba byed ba ma yin ba dang gzhi med ba dang mtshan nyid med ba dang rtog ba byed ba ma yin ba dang rig ba byed ba ma yin ba dang

original: thog ma dang / tha ma 'jig pa med par mdzad pa dang / g-yo ba med par mdzad pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / gnyis su med pa ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang / blo 'jug pa rnam par spangs pa dang /
analyzed: thogs ma dang tha ma jig ba med ba mdzad ba dang g-yo ba med ba mdzad ba dang gnyis su med ba dang gnyis su med ba ma yin ba dang zhi ba dang blo jug ba rnam ba spong ba dang

original: gnyen po med pa dang / ma gos pa dang / nam mkha'i lam dang 'dra ba dang / yod pa dang / med par brjod pa ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang / rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nyid dang @475a *//
analyzed: gnyen po med ba dang ma gos ba dang nam mkha lam dang dra ba dang yod ba dang med ba rjod ba ma yin ba dang zhi ba dang rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang sgyu ma lta bu chos nyid dang

original: mgal me bskor ba dang 'dra bar chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid do //
analyzed: mgal me skor ba dang dra ba chos thams cad ro gcig ba nyid do

original: su zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'don pa de ngan song thams cad las rab tu thar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: su jig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad ba don ba de ngan gro thams cad las rab tu thar ba gyur ro

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgya thams cad kyis dgongs ba gyur ro

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa thams cad kyis kyang rtag ba rgyun du srung ba dang skyob ba dang sbed ba byed ba gyur ro

original: de'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dran par bya'o //
analyzed: de gsang sngags kyi tshig di dag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad ba dran ba byed

original: bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma /
analyzed: joms ldan da ma phag ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma

original: mos pa la byams ma /
analyzed: mos ba la byams ma

original: yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan ma /
analyzed: yon tan dpog tu med ba dang ldan ma

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bzhes pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi ye shes kyis rnam ba thams cad mkhyen ba nyid sangs rgya dang byang chub sems dpa thams cad kyis phyag bzhes ba la phyag tshal lo

analyzed: di lta ste

analyzed: aom pradznye pradznye

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba di dzin na

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba bum gzung ba gyur ro

original: rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtag tu bzlas rjod byed na de las kyi sgrib ba thams cad byang ba gyur ro

original: 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang skye ba dran pa dang / yid gzhungs shing shes rab mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: di nas chi pho nas kyang skye ba dran ba dang yid gzhungs shing shes rab mtshungs ba med ba gyur ro

original: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos ma lus par gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi chos ma lus ba gzung ba gyur ro

original: gsang sngags dang / rig sngags thams cad kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsang sngags dang rig sngags thams cad kyang yongs su bzung ba gyur ro

original: 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang skye ba dran pa dang / yid gzhungs shing shes rab chen por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: di nas chi pho nas kyang skye ba dran ba dang yid gzhungs shing shes rab chen por gyur ro

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: phag ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba mchan brgya rtsa brgyad ba rdzogs so
